Package org.miniauth.credential

MiniAuth Core module Credential package.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AccessCredential
    Access credential/password stored on the server ("shared secrets").
    AccessIdentity
    Client and User "identity".
    AuthCredential
    "Marker" interface for all auth credentials.
    ConsumerCredential
    Consumer/client credential.
    CredentialPair
    Consumer + Token.
    TokenCredential
    Resource owner credential (e.g., for OAuth).
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AuthCredentialConstants
    This is used to allow using a Map in place of a specific credential type.

Package org.miniauth.credential Description

MiniAuth Core module Credential package. Note that we have a somewhat unusual API designs: We use Maps with these constants as keys in the public APIs, rather than using AuthCredential variety of bean classes.
